mapper.select: select tb.channel_id,tch.channel_name,tb.activity_id,ta.name as activity_name,tb.course_id,tc.name as course_name,tc.type,tb.name,ta.type as discount_type from tienchin_business tb left join tienchin_course tc on tb.course_id=tc.course_id left join tienchin_channel tch on tb.channel_id=tch.channel_id left join tienchin_activity ta on tb.activity_id=ta.activity_id where tb.phone=#{phone} order by tb.create_time desc;
